title: Hacking the OWI robotic arm bot
summary:
Demonstrating the OWI robotic arm running automated with a Raspberry Pi
and some python code.
description:
@ Kiwi PyCon 2013 - Saturday, 07 Sep 2013 - Track 1

**Audience level**

Novice

**Abstract**

After buying my son an OWI robotic arm,we decided to see if we could do
more with it than use the remote controller. We quickly found you can
buy a USB interface, however it only came with windows drivers. After
some googling we found we could control this with python scripts which
led to even more fun!

**Slides**

https://speakerdeck.com/nzpug/liz-quilty-hacking-the-owi-robotic-arm-bot
